definition: simple substance (consisting purely of one element, such as diamond)

sentences.english: Sulphur can influence the chemical compositions of gaseous hydrocarbon produced.
sentences.chinese: 單質硫能夠影響氣態烴產物的化學組成。

sentences.english: The enthalpy of pure substance at standard condition is zero.
sentences.chinese: 即，在標準狀態下，穩定單質的焓值爲零。

sentences.english: The key factor that controls aluminum hydrolyzing is activity of the aluminum powder.
sentences.chinese: 金屬鋁粉活性是制約單質鋁發生水解反應的關鍵因素。

sentences.english: An element is a simple substance that cannot be broken up into anything simpler.
sentences.chinese: 元素是一種單質，它不可能再分成任何更單純的物質。

sentences.english: Polysulfides was synthesized using FCC gasoline and sulfur.
sentences.chinese: 以單質硫和FCC餾分油爲原料合成有機硫化劑。

sentences.english: This mixture will resolve into two simple substances.
sentences.chinese: 這種混合物將分解爲兩種單質。

sentences.english: The simple substances include natural ones and also artificial ones.
sentences.chinese: 單質有天然的，也有人造的。

sentences.english: Cyclopentanone ethylene ketal was synthesized with I_2 as catalyst.
sentences.chinese: 以單質碘爲催化劑合成了環戊酮乙二縮酮。

sentences.english: A carbon-containing composite was synthesized by heating element sulfur and carbon nanotubes.
sentences.chinese: 由單質硫與碳納米管合成一種新型含碳複合材料。

sentences.english: Do the deposits on Europa also contain elemental sulfur?
sentences.chinese: 那麼歐羅巴上的沉積物中也有單質硫嗎？

sentences.english: Polycrystalline silicon is a kind of form of monatomic silicon.
sentences.chinese: 多晶硅是單質硅的一種形態。

sentences.english: The acidic-basic properties of simple substances and compounds are discussed from this viewpoint.
sentences.chinese: 本文還用此觀點討論了一些單質和化合物的酸鹼性質。
